se.jguru.nazgul.core.cache.impl.ehcache

Class NonDistributedEhCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.clustering.api.AbstractClusterable
      • se.jguru.nazgul.core.cache.impl.ehcache.NonDistributedEhCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<String>, Cache<String,Serializable>, se.jguru.nazgul.core.clustering.api.Clusterable

    public class NonDistributedEhCache
extends se.jguru.nazgul.core.clustering.api.AbstractClusterable
implements Cache<String,Serializable>
    Nazgul cache api implementation backed by a transacted EhCache with Strings as CacheKeys.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getListenerIds

        public List<String> getListenerIds()
        Acquires the list of all active Listeners of this Cache instance. Note that this does not include CacheListener instances wired to distributed objects, nor CacheListener instances wired to other members within a distributed cache.
        Specified by:
        getListenerIds in interface Cache<String,Serializable>
        Returns:
        a List holding all IDs of the active Listeners onto this (local member) Cache. Note that this does not include CacheListener instances wired to distributed objects, nor nor CacheListener instances wired to other members within a distributed cache.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(String key)
        Removes the CacheListener with the given key. This operation may be an asynchronous operation depending on the underlying cache implementation.
        Specified by:
        removeListener in interface Cache<String,Serializable>
        Parameters:
        key - The unique identifier for the given CacheListener to remove from operating on this Cache.

      • containsKey

        public boolean containsKey(String key)
        Returns true if this cache contains a mapping for the specified key
        Specified by:
        containsKey in interface Cache<String,Serializable>
        Parameters:
        key - The key whose presence in this map is to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if this map contains a mapping for the specified key.

      • performTransactedAction

        public void performTransactedAction(TransactedAction action)
                             throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Acquires a Transactional context from this Cache, and Executes the TransactedAction::doInTransaction method within it.
        Specified by:
        performTransactedAction in interface Cache<String,Serializable>
        Parameters:
        action - The TransactedAction to be executed within a Cache Transactional context.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying Cache implementation does not support Transactions.

      • getCacheManager

        public static net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager getCacheManager(String classpathRelativeConfigurationFile)
        Retrieves a CacheManager, using the configuration file located at the classpathRelativeConfigurationFile, read by the classloader of the EhCacheUtil class.
        Parameters:
        classpathRelativeConfigurationFile - an ehCache configuration file, i.e. read like "config/ehcache/someFile.xml"
        Returns:
        An instance CacheManager.

      • shutdownCache

        public static void shutdownCache(NonDistributedEhCache toShutDown)
        Kills the CacheManager of the provided LocalEhCache.
        Parameters:
        toShutDown - the LocalEhCache whose CacheManager should be shut down.
